definition: to face/to overlook/to arrive/to be (just) about to/just before
state official or subject in dynastic China/I, your servant (used in addressing the sovereign)/Kangxi radical 131
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)
to face sth/to be confronted with
as the time draws near/at the last moment/temporary/interim/ad hoc
on the edge of/(fig.) on the verge of/close to
(formal) to honor with one's presence/to attend
to be at the scene (sitting for an exam, performing, competing, giving directions etc)/firsthand (experience)/impromptu (remarks etc)
approaching one's end/with one foot in the grave
on leaving/on the point of departure

sentences.english: Hot summer days are coming while the high-grade summer goods will raise another heat wave.
sentences.chinese: 伏天將臨，夏日精晶將掀起又一個熱季狂潮。

sentences.english: Is the production line fully auto?
The balcony juts out over the garden.
There is no clear cut moment where you can say that the new world has arrived.
sentences.chinese: 沒有一個確切的時刻可謂新世界到臨了。

sentences.english: Do you have any siblings studying in HKAC or HKAA?
sentences.chinese: 你有兄弟姐妹就讀於香港三育書院香港復臨學校？

sentences.english: It's difficult not to get bogged down because everything tells me Christmas is coming.
sentences.chinese: 不受影響還真不易，由於統統都報告我聖誕節到臨了。

sentences.english: Thin film the scroll, clear bright light suspension.
sentences.chinese: 疏影臨書卷，清光皓月懸。

sentences.english: As Frost's Descent comes, the world is filled with the atmosphere of late autumn.
sentences.chinese: 伴隨着霜降的到臨，萬物充滿了晚秋的氣息。

sentences.english: Ziqiu ancient town, located in Changyang County in central Hubei Province, face to Qingjiang.
sentences.chinese: 古鎮資丘，位於湖北省長陽縣中部，臨清江而立。

sentences.english: On the other hand welcome to the new job companion and the encouragement.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面臨於新來的工作火伴暗示歡送和鼓舞。

sentences.english: Before leaving, aguero heard the name of summer Chang An is one leng.
sentences.chinese: 臨離開前，許儀聽到夏常安的名字就是一愣。

sentences.english: Economic globalization has also led to more enterprises to face fierce competition.
sentences.chinese: 而經濟的齊球化也招致企業要裏臨更劇烈的合做。

sentences.english: The same Redeemer is present in the sacrament of the Eucharist.
sentences.chinese: 也是這位救主，臨在於聖體聖事當中。

sentences.english: She is always all of a sweat before the exam.
sentences.chinese: 她臨考前總是急得不得了。

sentences.english: I am a member of Xi'an Sabbath Day Adventist church.
sentences.chinese: 我是西安基督復臨復臨安息日會的一員。

definition: to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
